persona_profile.name: Sarah Johnson
persona_profile.traits: extroverted, agreeable, organized, emotionally stable, open-minded

dialogue_history.speaker: patient
dialogue_history.utterance: I've been feeling really anxious lately. Everything seems overwhelming.

dialogue_history.speaker: therapist
dialogue_history.utterance: I hear that you're feeling anxious and overwhelmed. Can you tell me more about what's been going on?

dialogue_history.speaker: patient
dialogue_history.utterance: Well, I got a new job last month, and I feel like I'm not good enough. Everyone else seems to know what they're doing.

dialogue_history.speaker: therapist
dialogue_history.utterance: It sounds like you're comparing yourself to others and feeling like you don't measure up. That must be difficult.

dialogue_history.speaker: patient
dialogue_history.utterance: Yes, exactly. I keep thinking I'm going to make a mistake and everyone will realize I'm not qualified.

dialogue_history.speaker: therapist
dialogue_history.utterance: What makes you think you're not qualified for this position?

persona_profile.name: Michael Chen
persona_profile.traits: introverted, agreeable, organized, emotionally unstable, conservative

dialogue_history.speaker: patient
dialogue_history.utterance: I don't know what to do anymore. My relationship is falling apart.

dialogue_history.speaker: therapist
dialogue_history.utterance: That sounds very distressing. What's been happening in your relationship?

dialogue_history.speaker: patient
dialogue_history.utterance: My partner and I have been arguing constantly. It feels like we can't agree on anything.

dialogue_history.speaker: therapist
dialogue_history.utterance: When did you first notice these conflicts becoming more frequent?
